SEARCH
Package model

Class Toy

java.lang.Object
model.Toy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animal, BoardGame, Figure, Puzzle
public abstract class Toy extends Object
This superclass represents the common attributes for Toys in the database, including serial number, name, brand, price, availability, and age range.

    • Toy

      public Toy(String serialNum, String name, String brand, String price, int available, int age)
      Constructor method for the Toy superclass, which sets the values for all of its attributes.
      Parameters:
      serialNum - the serial number of the toy
      name - the name of the toy
      brand - the brand of the toy
      price - the price of the toy
      available - the quantity of the toy available
      age - the age range for the toy
